short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use, reliable coupon and discount site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding and redeeming coupons has never been this easy!

Bargainez is a fresh new coupon site where you will find working coupons and discounts, whether for online shopping or in-store.

With bargainez you can heart the stores and brands you like most. You will then receive exclusive offers in the form of coupons and other discounts for these stores.

Through hashtags, you can easily browse topics that interest you, such as free shipping, travel coupons, electronics, apps, etc.

Bargainez also has the largest selection of Passbook coupons for iOS devices, specifically the iPhone and the iPod touch. If you don't have an iPhone or iPod touch, you can still have the coupon sent to your phone through an SMS text message, or you can have it printed.
